text: Yeemeneh yan maraw isi diinik siinik korraaqa mari Yallak kalam mali, toysa Yalli usuk kicniih kaa kicna mara baahe-le, usun moominiinih Nacrur leeh Ramma iyya maraay korosul gibda leeh fayya keenil faxa maray Yallih gital yangicilleeh usun Yallah Abaanamak Sahteh Sahik mameesitan, woh Yallih muxxooy isih faxa marah tet yacee, Yallak muxxo farakka-le usuk isi muxxo cakkisita mara yaaxigi kinni
